---
category: news
title: "AI program created by former Troy student takes third place"
excerpt: "Advait Paliwal, a 2021 Troy High School graduate, and his team of students at Michigan State University, won third place in the Michigan EdTech Innovation Pitch contest. They presented YouLearn, an adaptive learning model that allows educators to upload curriculum for students to work with AI tutors."
